oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Experiences of Wheat dwarf virus in Finland 2004-2007
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Erlund, Patrik
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Influencing factors based on field observations 2004 and 2007: The tillage was the most important factor. The incidence was higher in direct drilled fields or fields with reduced tillage( more plant residues on the surface). The preceiding crop important.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Erlund, Patrik (2007) Experiences of Wheat dwarf virus in Finland 2004-2007. Paper at: Virus vector management : NJF seminar 402, Kristianstad, Sweden, 9-11 October 2007.
